description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.3m and eaves height of 3.0m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate repeat works to repollard G.1 and the removal of T.1 is necessitated by the damage it is causing as seen on Google Street View. T.1 is a small tree and the greenery lost will easily be replaced by the remaining vegetation. Thus there is no requirement to replant as the tree is not covered by the TPO and there will be no space for a replacement planting.Recommendation:Approve.
